hero.headline: One app to replace them all.
hero.subheadline: All of your work in one place: Tasks, Docs, Chat, Goals, & more. Mandor gives you the power to manage projects simply and effectively.
hero.free_forever: Free forever. No credit card required.

features.section_desc: Stop switching between apps. Mandor brings all your project management tools together in one intuitive platform.
features.views_desc: Visualize your work with Kanban boards, Lists, and Gantt charts. Customize views to match your team's style.
features.chat_desc: Communicate with your team directly within tasks and projects. No more scattered email threads.
features.automation_desc: Save time by automating repetitive tasks. Set triggers and actions to keep your projects moving forward.

values.title: Built for teams that move fast
values.task_mgmt_desc: Break down complex projects into manageable tasks and subtasks.
values.collab_desc: Assign roles, mention team members, and track progress together.
values.secure_desc: Enterprise-grade security to keep your data safe and accessible.

footer.desc: Making project management accessible, flexible, and powerful for everyone.
